channel.title: Papa Francisco on Simba Tango

item.title: El Papa Francisco
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Apparently the new pope is a tango lover, and now he got his own tango. Composition and lyrics by Daniel Ursini. Courtesy of Canciones para grabar. Happy Easter, Papa Fracisco! HT @milongaroom
